languages.text: {n}Паскаль обменивается с техножрецом серией двоичных сигналов, после чего грозно заявляет:{/n} "Инициирую процедуру ареста. Данная единица использует фальшивый код идентификации, что является грехом четвертой степени".

{n}Pasqal exchanges a series of binharic signals with the Tech-Priest before saying menacingly,{/n} "Initiating arrest procedure. This unit is using a fabricated identification code, which constitutes a Grade Four transgression."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль обменивается с техножрецом серией двоичных сигналов, после чего грозно заявляет:{/n} "Инициирую процедуру ареста. Данная единица использует фальшивый код идентификации, что является грехом четвертой степени".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal exchanges a series of binary signals with the Tech-Priest before saying menacingly,{/n} "Initiating arrest procedure. This unit is using a fabricated identification code, which constitutes a fourth-grade sin."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは一連の二進数の信号を技術司祭と交わし、威嚇するように言った。{/n}「拘束手順を開始します。このユニットは捏造認証コードを使用している。つまりは第４級の破戒です」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal exchanges a series of binharic signals with the Tech-Priest before saying menacingly,{/n} "Initiating arrest procedure. This unit is using a fabricated identification code, which constitutes a Grade Four transgression."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは一連の二進数の信号を技術司祭と交わし、威嚇するように言った。{/n}「拘束手順を開始します。このユニットは捏造認証コードを使用している。つまりは第４級の破戒です」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡与技术神甫以二进制语说了些什么，之后以威胁的语气开了口。{/n}“准备启动逮捕程序。此单位正在使用经过伪造的识别码，这已经构成了四级违法行为。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal exchanges a series of binharic signals with the Tech-Priest before saying menacingly,{/n} "Initiating arrest procedure. This unit is using a fabricated identification code, which constitutes a Grade Four transgression."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡与技术祭司以二进制语说了些什么，之后以威胁的语气开了口。{/n}“准备启动逮捕程序。此单位正在使用经过伪造的识别码，这已经构成了四级违法行为。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal tauscht eine Reihe binhärischer Signale mit dem Techpriester aus und sagt dann bedrohlich:{/n} "Leite Verhaftungsprotokoll ein. Die Einheit benutzt einen künstlichen Identifikationscode, was einem Verstoß vierten Grades entspricht."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal exchanges a series of binharic signals with the Tech-Priest before saying menacingly,{/n} "Initiating arrest procedure. This unit is using a fabricated identification code, which constitutes a Grade Four transgression."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal tauscht eine Reihe binhärischer Signale mit dem Techpriester aus und sagt dann bedrohlich:{/n} "Leite Verhaftungsprotokoll ein. Die Einheit benutzt einen künstlichen Identifikationscode, was einem Verstoß vierten Grades entspricht."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal échange une série de signaux binhaires avec le technoprêtre avant de hausser le ton d'un air menaçant :{/n} « Activation du protocole d'arrestation. Cette unité se sert d'un code d'identification contrefait, ce qui constitue une infraction de quatrième catégorie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal exchanges a series of binharic signals with the Tech-Priest before saying menacingly,{/n} "Initiating arrest procedure. This unit is using a fabricated identification code, which constitutes a Grade Four transgression."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal échange une série de signaux binhaires avec le technoprêtre avant de hausser le ton d'un air menaçant :{/n} « Activation du protocole d'arrestation. Cette unité se sert d'un code d'identification contrefait, ce qui constitue une infraction de quatrième catégorie. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal intercambia una serie de señales binarias con el tecnosacerdote antes de espetarle amenazadoramente.{/n} «Iniciando procedimiento de arresto. Esta unidad está usando un código de identificación falsificado, lo cual constituye una transgresión de cuarto grado».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal exchanges a series of binharic signals with the Tech-Priest before saying menacingly,{/n} "Initiating arrest procedure. This unit is using a fabricated identification code, which constitutes a Grade Four transgression."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal intercambia una serie de señales binarias con el tecnosacerdote antes de espetarle amenazadoramente.{/n} «Iniciando procedimiento de arresto. Esta unidad está usando un código de identificación falsificado, lo cual constituye una transgresión de cuarto grado».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, Tekno Rahip'le bir dizi ikilidil sinyal alışverişi yapıp düşmanca bir tavırla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Tutuklama prosedürü başlatılıyor. Bu birim, sahte bir kimlik saptama kodu kullanmakta olup bu da Dördüncü Kademe suçlar kapsamına girmektedir."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal exchanges a series of binharic signals with the Tech-Priest before saying menacingly,{/n} "Initiating arrest procedure. This unit is using a fabricated identification code, which constitutes a Grade Four transgression."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, Tekno Rahip'le bir dizi ikilidil sinyal alışverişi yapıyor ve düşmanca bir tavırla konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Tutuklama prosedürü başlatılıyor. Bu birim sahte bir kimlik saptama kodu kullanmakta ve bu da Dördüncü Kademe suçlar kapsamına girmekte."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
